    • Uses of Event in com.erkanerol.event.map

      Subclasses of Event in com.erkanerol.event.map 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description

      event class to transfer put operation information to other nodes

    • Uses of Event in com.erkanerol.event.network

      Subclasses of Event in com.erkanerol.event.network 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AttendEvent
      event class that is used to send attendance information to other nodes and get the current state of the manager
      class  LeaveEvent
      event class that is used to send leave information to other nodes
      class  NetworkEvent
      events for node activities in the network such as attend, leave etc.

      sends an event to other nodes
